module.name: HTML
module.param: should be time sourcetype date_hour count. EXCEPT That unmodified the Field Picker is insane and when events are what was requested, it puts in this "_raw" that makes no sense, so here there's a null-valued _raw at the end. (API always sends _raw on events whether or not it's in results.fields arg, so worrying about it is a waste of time.)
